content.raw:
clone the 3.0.1 branch
~~~
svn co https://simtk.org/svn/simbody/branches/Simbody3.0.1 ~/simbody
~~~
build with cmake as usual
~~~
cd ~/simbody
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DSimTK_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
make install
~~~
checkout gazebo and switch to simbody branch
~~~
hg clone -b simbody http://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo ~/gazebo
~~~
build gazeob with
~~~
cd ~/gazebo
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DCMAKE_MODULE_PATH=/usr/share/cmake -DSimTK_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
make install
~~~
content.html:
clone the 3.0.1 branch

svn co https://simtk.org/svn/simbody/branches/Simbody3.0.1 ~/simbody

build with cmake as usual

cd ~/simbody
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DSimTK_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
make install

checkout gazebo and switch to simbody branch

hg clone -b simbody http://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo ~/gazebo

build gazeob with

cd ~/gazebo
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DCMAKE_MODULE_PATH=/usr/share/cmake -DSimTK_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
make install
